price: Kuma Allah Yã yi wa'adi ga mummunai maza da mummunai mãtã da gidãjen Aljanna ƙõramu sunã gudãna daga ƙarƙashinsu, sunã madawwamã a cikinsu, da wurãren zama mãsu dãɗi a cikin gidãjen Aljannar. Kuma yarda daga Allah ce mafi girma. Wancan shi ne babban rabo, mai girma.
arabic: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَمَسَٰكِنَ طَيِّبَةٗ فِي جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٖۚ وَرِضۡوَٰنٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ أَكۡبَرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waʿada al-lahu al-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wamasākina ṭayyibatan fī jannāti ʿadnin wariḍ'wānun mina al-lahi akbaru dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
